Function template function_equal

boost::function_equal — Compare two function objects for equality.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/function_equal.hpp>


template<typename F, typename G> bool function_equal(const F& f, const G& g);

Description

Returns:

 f == g.

Throws:

 Only if f == g throws.
